title: Baltimore National Heritage Area: News
body: Park News       War of 1812 Traveling Exhibit "Defense of the Nation: Maryland in the War of 1812" is a free traveling exhibition available to museums, libraries, and historical sites. Heritage Update Star-Spangled Sailabration Edition, July 2012 During the Sailabration, the heritage area and the U.S. Navy worked to bring hundreds of volunteers to Baltimore communities.
